properties.name: ncube.sources.dir
properties.description: Path to generated source files. If this path points to a valid directory, the source from cell values that are inline (non URL-based) Groovy expressions will be dumped as cells are compiled.

properties.name: ncube.classes.dir
properties.description: Path to generated class files. If this path points to a valid directory, the generated class files from cell values that are inline (non URL-based) Groovy expressions will be written as cells are compiled and then used for class caching.

properties.name: ncube.cache.dir
properties.description: Path to cached .json NCube files. If this path points to a valid directory, the loaded NCube files will be cached here as .json files, with the folder structure matching the ApplicationID (5 levels) plus the name of the .json file will match the NCube name.

properties.name: ncube.cache.snapshotPolicy
properties.description: Path to cached .json NCube files. If this path points to a valid directory, the loaded NCube files will be cached here as .json files, with the folder structure matching the ApplicationID (5 levels) plus the name of the .json file will match the NCube name.

properties.name: ncube.proxy.cookiesToInclude
properties.description: Cookies to include in JsonHttpProxy when making proxy request (comma separated list, all lowercase).

properties.name: ncube.allow.mutable.methods
properties.description: Allow NCubeRuntime to perform mutable methods.

properties.name: ncube.accepted.domains
properties.description: Allow access to external domains.

properties.name: ncube.stackEntry.coordinate.value.max
properties.description: Abbreviate coordinate value strings on StackEntry to a max size.

properties.name: ncube.target.scheme
properties.description: Scheme for JsonHttpProxy connection (http or https).

properties.name: ncube.target.host
properties.description: Hostname for JsonHttpProxy connection (IP or DNS name).

properties.name: ncube.target.port
properties.description: Port for JsonHttpProxy connection.

properties.name: ncube.target.context
properties.description: Context for JsonHttpProxy connection.

properties.name: ncube.target.username
properties.description: Username for JsonHttpProxy connection. If not set, headers will be passes along for authentication.

properties.name: ncube.target.password
properties.description: Password for JsonHttpProxy connection. If not set, headers will be passed along for authentication.

properties.name: ncube.target.numConnections
properties.description: Number of connections allowed through JsonHttpPoxy.

properties.name: ncube.cache.max.size
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of entries the cache may contain. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.cache.evict.type
properties.description: Specify either expireAfterWrite or expireAfterAccess to be called on cache builder. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.cache.evict.duration
properties.description: Duration for the ncube.cache.evict.type. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.cache.evict.units
properties.description: Specify seconds, minutes, hours or days. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.cache.concurrency
properties.description: Guides the allowed concurrency among update operations. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.cache.refresh.min
properties.description: Frequency (in minutes) that non-evictable n-cubes are refreshed (Set to 1/3 or less of ncube.cache.evict.duration).

properties.name: ncube.perm.cache.max.size
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of entries the cache may contain. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.perm.cache.evict.type
properties.description: Specify either expireAfterWrite or expireAfterAccess to be called on cache builder. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.perm.cache.evict.duration
properties.description: Duration for the ncube.cache.evict.type. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.perm.cache.evict.units
properties.description: Specify seconds, minutes, hours or days. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.perm.cache.concurrency
properties.description: Guides the allowed concurrency among update operations. See Guava's CacheBuilder documentation.

properties.name: ncube.datasource.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name.

properties.name: ncube.datasource.url
properties.description: Datasource URL.

properties.name: ncube.datasource.username
properties.description: Datasource username.

properties.name: ncube.datasource.password
properties.description: Datasource password.

properties.name: ncube.datasource.tomcat.validation-query
properties.description: Datasource validation query.
